simplyswords.config.basic_settings.coold: Delay in ticks after activating the effect
simplyswords.config.basic_settings.durat: Duration of the effect in ticks
simplyswords.config.basic_settings.frequ: How often the effect occurs; 'once per X ticks'
simplyswords.config.basic_settings.radiu: Radius of the effect in blocks
simplyswords.gem_powers.disabledPowers.d:
§a[Runic Power Blacklisting]§7
Adding a power to this list will prevent that runic power from being obtainable.
simplyswords.gem_powers.simplySkills.des:
§6[Simply Skills Compatibility Gems]§7
These gems can only be acquired when Simply Skills is installed.
simplyswords.general.compatEnableSpellPo:
§a[When Spell Power is installed]§7
If enabled, some weapon effects will scale with Spell Power attributes.
simplyswords.general.enableTooltipInfoBu: Show/hide the tooltip buttons that appear on some items from the mod. This will also disable the associated hotkey actions, and hide gem socket info.
simplyswords.general.enableUniqueGemSock: If disabled, gem slots will no longer appear on freshly generated Unique weapons. Not retroactive.
simplyswords.general.tooltipInfoButtonsR: Tooltip Info Buttons require inventory screen

Whether the tooltip info buttons require the inventory screen to be open in order to function.
Disabling this may result in mod conflicts that result in the hotkey actions activating when they should not.
simplyswords.loot.disabledUniqueWeaponLo:
§6[Loot Blacklisting]§7
Including the id of any unique sword will prevent that item from generating in loot.
The item will still exist in the creative menu, but will be unobtainable through ordinary survival gameplay.
simplyswords.loot.enableContainedRemnant: Whether contained remnants change form or not. Disable this if you disable unique weapon drops.
simplyswords.loot.enableLootDrops.desc: Disabling this setting will prevent Simply Swords from generating loot in chests.
simplyswords.loot.enableLootInVillages.d: When enabled, Simply Swords loot can spawn in village chests.
simplyswords.loot.rareLootTableWeight.de: Chance for Diamond weapons to appear in chests. 100 = 100%.
simplyswords.loot.runicLootTableWeight.d: Chance for Runic Tablets to appear in chests. 100 = 100%.
simplyswords.loot.standardLootTableWeigh: Chance for Iron > Gold weapons to appear in chests. 100 = 100%.
simplyswords.loot.uniqueLootTableOptions: Specific loot tables that unique weapons will appear in, and the chance they appear in that table
Chance for Unique weapons to appear in chests. 100 = 100%.

simplyswords.weapon_attributes.materialD: Damage modifiers scale off these base values.
simplyswords.weapon_attributes.typeAttac: Recommended range: -1.0 to -3.7, with -1.0 being fast and -3.7 being slow.
simplyswords.weapon_attributes.typeDamag:
The damage values of weapons can be modified by adjusting their weights.
This is not the outputted damage value you see in game, but it affects it directly.
Calculation: vanilla tool material damage + base_modifier + modifier = actual modifier.
Changes require game restart to take effect.

§a[Damage Modifiers]§7
Example use-case: Adding 3 to a value below will INCREASE the in-game damage of that weapon type by 3.
simplyswords.weapon_attributes.uniqueAtt: Recommended range: -1.0 to -3.7, with -1.0 being fast and -3.7 being slow.
simplyswords.weapon_attributes.uniqueDam:
Uniques scale a little bit differently and only require one modifier.
This is not the outputted damage value you see in game, but it affects it directly.
Calculation: Vanilla netherite tool damage + damage_modifier = actual modifier.

§6[Damage Modifiers]§7
Example use-case: Adding 3 to a value below will INCREASE the in-game damage of that weapon by 3.
